bs-dashboards-pref-userdashboardonlogo:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for site logo links to user dashboard.

This option replaces the link target of site logo.
admindashboard:
Special page name for admin dashboard.

"admin" is short for administrator.
